name: wisecracking
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
often making funny remarks: Bugs Bunny was a wisecracking cartoon rabbit who became an icon. Friedman was a wisecracking kid who wrote for the high school paper about kissing in the halls. See
wisecrack
More examplesFewer examplesShe's smart and observant, wise and wisecracking.In most network sitcoms nowadays, the wisecracking characters are aware that they're being funny.Wisecracking flight attendants had passengers rolling in the aisles.

the activity of making funny remarks: His wisecracking gets a bit tedious after a while. Sadly, despite the relentless wisecracking, there's very little plot to carry this film. See
wisecrack
More examplesFewer examplesColleagues frequently tell of his wisecracking and wind-ups.Corky's wisecracking distracts from what should be the movie's main concern, namely the solving of a mystery.They assembled for an evening of song and dance, with a touch of feeble wisecracking.
